typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TimeStamp as string,
		Value as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 2) ~> sourceGPS
sourceGPS select(mapColumn(
		TimeStamp,
		Value
	)) ~> timeandvalue
filterGPLL derive(recordtype = split(Value, ',')[1],
		latitude = split(Value, ',')[2],
		dir_latitude = split(Value, ',')[3],
		longitude = split(Value, ',')[4],
		dir_logitude = split(Value, ',')[5],
		utc_position = split(Value, ',')[6],
		is_valid = split(Value, ',')[7],
		mode = split(Value, ',')[8]) ~> gpgll
timeandvalue derive(recordtype = split(Value, ',')[1]) ~> timerecordandvalue
timerecordandvalue filter(recordtype=='$GPGLL') ~> filterGPLL
